mapper.update:
update t_feedback
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_device_id = #{userDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
context = #{context,jdbcType=CHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR},
androidmodel = #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR},
buildversion = #{buildversion,jdbcType=TINYINT},
versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buildrelease = #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR},
url1 = #{url1,jdbcType=CHAR},
url2 = #{url2,jdbcType=CHAR},
url3 = #{url3,jdbcType=CHAR},
where feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_feedback set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_device_id = #{userDeviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, context = #{context,jdbcType=CHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=CHAR}, androidmodel = #{androidmodel,jdbcType=CHAR}, buildversion = #{buildversion,jdbcType=TINYINT}, versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buildrelease = #{buildrelease,jdbcType=CHAR}, url1 = #{url1,jdbcType=CHAR}, url2 = #{url2,jdbcType=CHAR}, url3 = #{url3,jdbcType=CHAR} where feedback_id = #{feedbackId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select tf.feedback_id as feedbackId, tf.user_id as userId, tf.user_device_id as userDeviceId, tf.context as context, tf.contact as contact, tf.create_time as createTime, tf.url1 as url1, tf.url2 as url2, tf.url3 as url3, tf.manufacturer as manufacturer, tf.androidmodel = androidmodel, tf.buildversion as buildversion, tf.versioncode as versioncode, tf.buildrelease as buildrelease, tu.phone as phone from t_feedback tf left join t_user tu on tf.user_id = tu.user_id
AND tf.create_time between #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
AND tu.phone like #{phone} '%'
AND tf.contact like #{contact} '%'
order by tf.feedback_id desc
